solution_line_template: She averaged {avg_points_per_game} points per game because {total_points_season} / {total_games} = <<{total_points_season}/{total_games}={avg_points_per_game}>>{avg_points_per_game}
She averaged {points_from_two_pointers} points a game off two-point baskets because {two_point_baskets_per_game} x {two_point_value} = {points_from_two_pointers}

She averaged {points_from_free_throws} points a game from free throws because {free_throws_per_game} x {free_throw_value} = <<{free_throws_per_game}*{free_throw_value}={points_from_free_throws}>>{points_from_free_throws}

She averaged {points_from_non_three_pointers} points a game off non-three point baskets because {points_from_two_pointers} + {points_from_free_throws} = <<{points_from_two_pointers}+{points_from_free_throws}={points_from_non_three_pointers}>>{points_from_non_three_pointers}

She averaged {points_from_three_pointers} points from three-pointers because {avg_points_per_game}-{points_from_non_three_pointers} = <<{avg_points_per_game}-{points_from_non_three_pointers}={points_from_three_pointers}>>{points_from_three_pointers}

She averaged {avg_three_pointers_per_game} three-pointers a game because {points_from_three_pointers} / {three_point_value} = <<{points_from_three_pointers}/{three_point_value}={avg_three_pointers_per_game}>>{avg_three_pointers_per_game}
